items.title: 3D Emoji Town
items.description: An animated 3D town created using emojis and CSS.

items.title: Change Color With Voice
items.description: Using the JavaScript speech recognition API to take a spoken color from a user and apply that color to an element.

items.title: LastPass Vault Layout
items.description: Using CSS grid with flexbox fallback to re-create the LastPass vault layout.
